subject: Need help on : API Testing using jUnit
msgSnippet: Hi, I am new to API testing Came to know that, jUnit test framework can also be used to build the API testing harness. Can you please guide me, as to how to
messageBody:
Hi,
I am new to API testing
Came to know that, jUnit test framework can also be used to build the API testing harness.
Can you please guide me, as to how to use jUnit to develop a framework for testing API's (The API's are written in java).
